pullrequest.title: Fix issue 2111 by providing options to preserve world velocity when set positions

content.raw:
new windows compiler warning:

~~~
ODEJoint.hh:93, MSBuild, Priority: Normal
'gazebo::physics::ODEJoint::SetPosition':
 virtual function overrides 'gazebo::physics::Joint::SetPosition',
 previous versions of the compiler did not override when parameters only differed by const/volatile qualifiers
~~~

it looks like `const` was added to some arguments in the `Joint` class but it wasn't propagated to the downstream classes

I'll try to make them consistent

it looks like const was added to some arguments in the Joint class but it wasn't propagated to the downstream classes

I'll try to make them consistent
